ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_relfld | |- ( Rel R -> U. U. R = ( dom R u. ran R ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_reseq2d | |- ( Rel R -> ( R |` U. U. R ) = ( R |` ( dom R u. ran R ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_resundi | |- ( R |` ( dom R u. ran R ) ) = ( ( R |` dom R ) u. ( R |` ran R ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqtr | |- ( ( ( R |` U. U. R ) = ( R |` ( dom R u. ran R ) ) /\ ( R |` ( dom R u. ran R ) ) = ( ( R |` dom R ) u. ( R |` ran R ) ) ) -> ( R |` U. U. R ) = ( ( R |` dom R ) u. ( R |` ran R ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_resss | |- ( R |` ran R ) C_ R |
| 6 |  | #P_resdm | |- ( Rel R -> ( R |` dom R ) = R ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ssequn2 | |- ( ( R |` ran R ) C_ R <-> ( R u. ( R |` ran R ) ) = R ) |
| 8 |  | #P_uneq1 | |- ( ( R |` dom R ) = R -> ( ( R |` dom R ) u. ( R |` ran R ) ) = ( R u. ( R |` ran R ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( ( R |` dom R ) = R -> ( ( R |` U. U. R ) = ( ( R |` dom R ) u. ( R |` ran R ) ) <-> ( R |` U. U. R ) = ( R u. ( R |` ran R ) ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqtr | |- ( ( ( R |` U. U. R ) = ( R u. ( R |` ran R ) ) /\ ( R u. ( R |` ran R ) ) = R ) -> ( R |` U. U. R ) = R ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ex | |- ( ( R |` U. U. R ) = ( R u. ( R |` ran R ) ) -> ( ( R u. ( R |` ran R ) ) = R -> ( R |` U. U. R ) = R ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_syl6bi | |- ( ( R |` dom R ) = R -> ( ( R |` U. U. R ) = ( ( R |` dom R ) u. ( R |` ran R ) ) -> ( ( R u. ( R |` ran R ) ) = R -> ( R |` U. U. R ) = R ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_com3r | |- ( ( R u. ( R |` ran R ) ) = R -> ( ( R |` dom R ) = R -> ( ( R |` U. U. R ) = ( ( R |` dom R ) u. ( R |` ran R ) ) -> ( R |` U. U. R ) = R ) ) ) |
| 14 | 7, 13 | #P_sylbi | |- ( ( R |` ran R ) C_ R -> ( ( R |` dom R ) = R -> ( ( R |` U. U. R ) = ( ( R |` dom R ) u. ( R |` ran R ) ) -> ( R |` U. U. R ) = R ) ) ) |
| 15 | 5, 6, 14 | #P_mpsyl | |- ( Rel R -> ( ( R |` U. U. R ) = ( ( R |` dom R ) u. ( R |` ran R ) ) -> ( R |` U. U. R ) = R ) ) |
| 16 | 4, 15 | #P_syl5com | |- ( ( ( R |` U. U. R ) = ( R |` ( dom R u. ran R ) ) /\ ( R |` ( dom R u. ran R ) ) = ( ( R |` dom R ) u. ( R |` ran R ) ) ) -> ( Rel R -> ( R |` U. U. R ) = R ) ) |
| 17 | 2, 3, 16 | #P_sylancl | |- ( Rel R -> ( Rel R -> ( R |` U. U. R ) = R ) ) |
